args:
When Gatov tells Sheila's soul they will take on
everything together—including her sins—she is
freed from the black mana. Her heart returned,
Sheila uses her power as an Auspex to close
the tear leading to the space between worlds
which opens the way to the Dragon Necropolis.
Are you all right? Say something!
(I've been exposed to too much black\nmana and lost control of my body...)
Gatov, stop! If you get any closer,\nyou'll be consumed by black mana!
Sinpunishmentsinpunishmentsin...\nALL MY FAULT! ALL MY FAAAULT!
(No—it's MY fault. The fact that she lost\nher heart and now suffers can all be laid\nat my own feet.)
(As her father, I must get her heart back,\neven at the cost of my life.)
(And yet, what words will she hear?\nWhat does she even desire?)
I want to be of use to you and our people.\nI want to protect our home.
(Did I ever once even consider\nwhat SHE wanted?)
(Or did I merely adopt the visage of a good\nand caring father even as I pushed the\nburden of my own arrogance onto her?)
(And in that case, I know what I\nmust say to her!)
I hear you, my daughter. And if that's how\nit is, let us take responsibility together.
You need not suffer alone anymore,\nfor we will share the burden!
I will never again permit my love to\ndisrespect or rob you of your own will.
Your past, your sins, your punishment,\nAND your future are all your own.
But you need not be imprisoned by them\nor suffer alone. Whatever you may\nbecome, your father will be at your side.
Are the two of you all right?
Your voice freed me from the black mana.
I'm so glad my words reached you.
I'm sorry, Father. The fall of Lefkos\nwas my fault alone.
Yet I have made more than my share of\nmistakes—the biggest of all being that I\ndid not see what was in your heart.
From now on, ours will be a relationship\nof respect. I intend to support you,\nand I would ask that you do the same.
Because we are father and daughter.
Well...I don't seem to exactly be my\nold self.
Perhaps? I'm not certain.\nMy heart feels...dull, somehow.
But the fact I have it back at all makes me\nso happy—and feeling that emotion only\nadds to my happiness.
Your mind and body were separated for\na very long time, so I imagine it will take\na while for things to return to normal.
Either way though, the fact you can feel\nyour joy again makes me happy as well.
Mornin', folks. Saaaay, looking good,\nSheila! You pick those duds out yourself?
I did. Now that my heart is back,\nI can choose things for myself.
This is a ceremonial outfit...\nI'll be wearing it as I seal off the space\nbetween worlds.
I can, for I am a vessel of the Primal Mark.
I knew it! You are an Auspex!
During my long years in contact with the\nblack mana, I came to understand who—\nand what—I actually am.
That contact did not change my soul,\nbecause my existence is something akin\nto black mana already.

Your being an Auspex and a vessel of the
Primal Mark would definitely explain your
resistance to black mana—and your ability
to manipulate it.
But I am an Auspex with no such\nresistance. What of that?
Well, if I had to guess, I'd wager each\nAuspex has their own characteristics.
Like you've got more mana than anyone\nelse, but I'm sure the others have unique\ntalents of their own.
Also, it's possible you haven't fully\nmanifested of all your Auspex powers yet.
You think there could be more power\nhiding within me?!
I wouldn't rule it out. But in any event,\nSheila's being a vessel of the Primal Mark\nis what saved her.
If she weren't, she might not have ended\nup considering the idea of trying to control\nblack mana.
But then she also wouldn't have been able\nto get her heart back.
Numerous chances, coincidences, and\nchoices all worked in concert to bring\nus to where we are now.
You ask me, I think it's a miracle.
Thank you, Father—and the rest of you\nas well.
But everything you just said only confirms\nmy suspicion that it's time for me to go.
I must close the tear that leads to the\nspace between worlds. Once that is done,\nthe black mana here should disappear.
And that will open the way\nto the Dragon Necropolis.
Sheila's soul is back because you risked\nyour life for her. I didn't do much at all.
You were the impetus that brought me\nback to my homeland.
This place holds bitter memories for me,\nand I'd never have returned here of my\nown accord.
You really are Aurelius' son—and a man\nwith the power to guide people in a new\nand better direction.
Whatever lies ahead, Sheila and I\nwill be with you until the end.
Confirming a drop in the density of\nblack mana. We can now proceed.
I guess Sheila got the rift closed.\nLet's go meet up with her.
The Dragon Necropolis is deeper within.\nFollow me.
And in there sleep the primordial dragons.
Come on, everyone!\nHope for the future lies just ahead!
